root.t: Defragmentation can help to fix some incorrect items in your progressbar
Play the game 7 days in a row to get it!
We're sorry, we'll try our best to improve the game!
Hi! This is a game disk. It changes each time you run Progressbar95. Each time, bonuses and secrets are placed in new locations. Find them all. Good luck!
The list of products have been updated
You've unlocked a new device upgrade!
To do list 1.Clean my computer mouse 2.Get a new videocard
To begin a game, please tap the Begin button
There is a save with better progress in the Cloud!
The Firewall can protect your progressbar from the red items. Simply hide behind it

Do you want to replay the level? You'll lose one of your hearts!
Move your finger to move the panel

Welcome to Progressbar setup!
Congratulations on your choice of a new version of Progressbar!
Setup will take about 5 to 10 seconds
Feel free to check out our policies anytime for more information
By clicking 'OK' or continuing to use this game, you acknowledge that you accept our Privacy Policy. The game uses cookies and analytics to provide you with the best possible experience
Dark Blue — right ones Light Blue — bonus Orange — wrong ones Red — dangerous Pink — minus Gray — empty Green — win Multi-colored — random
Feel free to check out our policies anytime for more information
Select the correct button to close
Put segments into the empty part!
Let's restart and lose all your current game progress!
Thank you very much! We love you!
Use ScanProgress to fix the error
Try to be fast enough to beat the Errors. Once you reach the finish line, you win. The Errors move automatically
Quickly tap the [Scan] button to progress
Do you want to start from level 1?
Let's restart and lose all your current game progress!
Catch this item to fill the progressbar
The Survival mode. You don't need to collect blue items, the progressbar will fill automatically. Try to avoid the red ones, their number is increased
If it is hard for you to distinguish colors, turn on:
Are you sure to replace a wallpaper on your phone with the one from the game?
Cloud saving will let you play on different devices and will synchronize your progress
Progressbar95 is a hypercasual game. Your current goal is to fill the progressbar by catching falling items. Your main goal is to collect points to get new computer upgrades and install new systems.

DOS extra commands:
COLOR-change text color GREEN-a green text DEL -delete a file TIME-current time ECHO -print text EXIT-exit the DOS SHUTDOWN-Shutdown/Restart
Would you mind giving us a review? Tell us what you think, and share your ideas!
To do list 1.Play Progressbar 2.Write a review
Idea, code, art by Igor Uduslivii
Includes: (Ad free, 95 plus, 98, Meme, 2000, XB, Wista, 7)
Includes: (Ad free, 95 plus, 98, Meme, 2000, XB, Wista)
Ads are removed. Have a great time!
You don't need to defragment right now. You have no errors in your progressbar
Includes: (Ad free, 95 plus, 98, Meme, 2000, XB, Wista,7,81,10)

ProgressDOS is a text-based adventure for advanced users (real 'hackers'!). By exploring directories you can find bonuses, cheats, easter eggs and other secrets.
Use DOS commands to explore directories. Type HELP and press Enter for a list of the commands.
You can get more points and meet more game elements in Progressbar9.
A fatal mistake has been made by the player. The current game session will be terminated
* Press any key to terminate the current session * Don’t press CTRL+ALT+DEL to restart
if this is not the first time you've seen this message, try playing again. If it appears again, follow these steps:
* Try to play better * Use ScanProgress

A misstep has been detected and the game session has been shut down.
The problem seems to be caused by: PLAYER
Your game ran into a problem that it couldn't handle
Don't let the ball drop out of your screen. Hit it with your progressbar to generate points.
It's now safe to turn off the game

Your local save file is corrupted!
You can try to download a backup from the cloud

Your purchases were not confirmed by Google Play servers. The reason might be either a server error or purchase cancellation. If you didn't cancel the purchase, please tap the button to restore your purchases.
If this message appears again try restarting the app.
You may share it with your friends
You have used this code before!
You can use cheats. Look for them in the game or on the Internet. Enter them via ProgressDOS
You can obtain all systems for free by playing the game. To get it right now, you may buy them in the store
I am System32, you may call me Sys32. I am completely operational
You've killed me recently, and that is okay. I have a very good memory!
Collect points to get a new system!
Do you wish to format the disk?
You will lose all your data!
RAM Emergency! There is too much RAM!

Your Progressbar 7 is out of support!
Actually that means nothing... enjoy it!
Try to find factors and replicate the product to get a bonus
Includes: (Ad free, All current and future skins) Best deal!
As a Pro, you now can double tap to switch the progressbar panel into a vertical position, double tap again to switch it back
ProgressSweeper is an analytical math puzzle for professional players. Your objective is to open correct cells and get blue segments while avoiding yellow and red ones
Start by tapping the top left cell. It is always empty, and safe
The cell is empty. That means that all cells around are safe as well. Now tap the second one
Great! You've found a blue segment and got 5%! Now tap a cell nearby
As you can see: there is a number ONE. That means that we have ONE bad segment nearby. Let's try to find it
The numbers are yellow, that means that the bad segment we are looking for is yellow. Let's continue
There are numbers around red or yellow segments! Red segments have red numbers.
Now we have enough clues. We don't want to get a yellow one. Let's flag it
You've selected the yellow flag. Now tap the cell
Superb! Each flag placed correctly will give you some extra points. Now continue the game
Progress Defender is a 'tower defense' game mode. Your objective is to protect your progressbar from red segments by placing firewalls and other widgets
The progressbar can be dragged only horizontally
Catch this blue segment as usual
You have to fill the progressbar to win
You can use your progress to buy widgets
The Firewall is a way to protect your progressbar from red segments. Tap the button
Tap an open placeholder to place the Firewall
Great! Now you have some protection
Pop-ups are not dangerous, but they can destroy the firewalls
Create a Generator to get extra blue segments
Tap the button to get a blue segment
The counter is offline. The game needs internet to check the current date.
Are you living in the future? The calendar on your phone is fast. Please check the date.
The current date was not confirmed by our online calendar. The counter will be reset.
The Progressbar95 music theme is available in a better quality. To unlock it, you need to play a special game mode and complete a level without any errors. Do you want to try?
You've unlocked a new music theme!
You need to get a Perfectionist bonus to unlock this music file
Now you have a solid state drive, which works silently. If you like HDD noises, you can turn them on in Settings>Sound menu
Includes: (Ad free, 95 plus, 98, Meme, 2000, XB, Wista,7,81,10,1X)
Includes: (Ad free, 'Progresstein 3d' game mode without timer)
Use Google Play username and userpic
Create a yin and yang pattern
Play the Progress Defender game mode
Explore more than five layers of directories
Get more than 10000 points in DOS
Get more than 50000 points in DOS
Play the Progress Sweeper game mode
Don't close any popups in Hardcore mode
This is food for your Bin. Drag it onto the Bin icon
Bin is your digital pet. You have to take care of him! Clean, feed (by using trash files), and encourage him. Make Bin happy to get rewards! Otherwise it might be a nightmare
I'm so mad! Here are some presents for you!!!
I have a lot of files inside!
Hello! I'm glad to see you!
Hello! I'm happy to see you! I love you!
I’m not ready for a cleaning yet. Wait until tomorrow!
I've said that I'm not ready!
I'm bored. Can you tell me a fairy tale? Please!
Yes, of course! Once upon a time, there was a Bin...
Do you love me? I need to know
Yes! I love you very much!
Why are files made of zeros and ones?
Because they are digital, my dear
I feel a little bit lonely...
You are not! Here I am!
Who is better: Clippy or me?
Of course you! Clippy is annoying
Am I annoying? Am I talking too much?
No! You are just very sociable. I like that!
Yes, you are talking and talking!
I'm afraid of ProgressDOS very much! It's so dark down there!
Don't be, you are brave! ProgressDOS is not scary at all!
Yes! ProgressDOS is full of monsters!!!
I wonder, why is the sky on Progressbar95's intro blue?
Because a normal sky is blue
Calculator said bad things about me! Now I'm sad...
Oh, ignore him, he's so stupid and rude!
He was right, Calculator is always right!
Of course we are! You are my best friend!
No, we are not! We are enemies!
PB-DOS Shell is a text-based shell for ProgressDOS that should make your life much easier. Forget about the console! Our progressive user interface is much more ergonomic and comfortable
PB-DOS Shell does not support mouse input, you need to use keys to move the progressbar. That's easy and fun!
ProgressTrix. You have to complete a solid line of blocks to complete a level. It's harder than you think

Progressbar Commander. Build a stack of elements at the right column. Press the [->] button to move a moving element from the left column to the right. Be sure to read description of the elements! "Blue" and "Yellow" are good, "Red" is bad!
↑ = Rotate ↓ = Drop ← = Move left → = Move right
Ctrl+ ← = Prev. menu Ctrl+ → = Next menu Ctrl+↑ = Up Ctrl+↓ = Down Enter = Select
↑ = Up ↓ = Down ← = Left → = Right {r..m} = Close popups
← = Left → = Right Enter = Select X = Close
Collect Pro labels to get the system
Why did you wake me up?
This option may help to configure the game's interface on screens with rounded corners or bottom notches
You may need an external mouse for this option to work properly

Progressbar Chitown is a 'spiritual predecessor' of Progressbar 95, its early edition. The system recreates gameplay features of the very first public version of Progressbar 95 [ver. 0.21]. It has only one game mode and a limited number of popups and segments. There are no utilities to help you, so the gameplay is a little bit harder. It's a great way to challenge your skills!
Use a mousewheel or arrow keys to rotate

For professional players only! This is a special utility to create your own custom game mode. Use checkboxes and sliders to adjust the number of popups, game speed and so on. Extreme parameters provide more points. You may save your settings as presets and share their codes with other players.
You may use settings from other players. Check the game's communities for special 'Custom difficulties codes' and enter them here
You may save your settings as presets
Do you want to overwrite the existing save?
Share this code, so other players might try to beat your game mode
Enter a valid password for this system
Wrong password! It should look like ********
Are you going to spend your product keys?
Unfortunately you are out of product keys
Beat the impossible difficulty while playing in high stages
Get a bonus from the heart
Solve the puzzle to get some extra points
Now you have a solid state drive, which works silently. Do you want to keep the HDD noises?

Filer is a file-based adventure for curious users. By exploring folders you may discover bonuses, cheats, easter eggs and other secrets.
Note: You may drag files to Bin to remove them
This Help is to help you to use Help. Use Help when you need help. Hope this helps!
Hi! Bar OS is different. You have to play by new rules. You don't need to drag the progressbar
We removed the drag feature, and we had the courage to move on
Now the progressbar is moving automatically! It's amazing isn't it?
One more thing, use this fantastic button to generate segments
The puzzle has already been solved
Move your cursor to move the panel
PB XL is a numeric maze. Your objective is to fill the bottom row by moving a segment from the very top.
Click the cell in the row to move
You can move vertically via columns
Haha! That was a joke. You can't move diagonally!
You can move only horizontally or vertically!
All characters and operating systems depicted in this game are fictitious. Any resemblance to a character, operating system living or dead is purely coincidental
That was not a spam message!
Your Inbox is full! Please remove some messages

Hi, dear player! Hope you are doing well!
This is your virtual in-game mailbox. You'll receive various messages and decide if they are important and need to be replied to, ignored or removed as a email spam. You may get some bonuses by making correct decisions.
Have a great day Icoeye and Spooky House Studios
When is the next update coming?

Hello!
This is a very annoying spam message!
Have a great day!
Email spam, Email spam, Email spam… Lovely email spam! Amazing email spam!
We invite you to come see and hear about the PBSYSTEM-21 family at the product presentation we will giving this month

Dear friend,
My name is Clippy the Third. I'm the Prince of Progressbaria. I have deposited 10 000 points. I need your help to obtain the points, but I don't want to reveal my identity. You may get 50% of the points. To unlock them, please send me 2000 of your points first.
Yours sincerely, Mr. Clippy III, Prince of Progressbaria
I'm sorry to have to inform you that your message could not be delivered to one or more recipients

Haha!
I'm a fake Prince! I lied to you! I took your points! Never trust strangers on the Internet!
Yours sincerely, Mr. Clippy III, a fake Prince of Progressbaria
Best deals! Sales! Discounts! I know that this is annoying and I'm proud of that!

Dear friend,
My name is Dog. I'm a good character from the game Progressbar95. If you ask politely, I'll give you a bonus.
Yours sincerely, Mr. Dog

Dear friend,
Here is your bonus! I love you!
Yours sincerely, Mr. Dog

You are very lucky! I'm a real Prince! Most of these messages are fakes, but this one was real.
I've sent you 5000 points!
Don't try this again! Never trust strangers on the Internet!
Yours sincerely, Mr. Clippy III, a real Prince of Progressbaria
Would you be so kind to give me a bonus?

Hi, there!
How is the current project doing? We need it ASAP!
Best wishes, Boss
Hey! Show some respect! I'm your boss! Best wishes, Boss
How dare you!!! I'm your BOSS! Do you want to be fired? Have a nice day, Boss

Hello!
Hope you are doing fine.
I would like to inform you that YOU ARE FIRED!!!
Have a wonderful day, Boss
I'm working on the project. It will be ready soon

How soon? I need to know exactly!
Have a wonderful day, Boss
The project is almost ready! I'll send you a preview by tomorrow

Great job!
You'll get a bonus of +1000 points
Have a wonderful day, Boss

Hey!
Are you working on the project or playing Progressbar95?
Best wishes, Boss

Hey!
Great! You will be my best employee soon!
Best wishes, Boss

Hey!
Wow! Progressbar95 is a good game! I like it as well.
Here is a bonus for you: 100 points!
Best wishes, Boss

Hi!
I'm your boss. I know that you like your work very much. Would you like to work nights and weekends for about a year? We have a very inessential project to complete!
Best wishes, Boss

Hi!
We know that your system crashes from time to time.
Have you tried turning it off and on again?
Don't bother us, Tech Support

Hi!
Turn it off and on, and then tell us if that helped.
Don't bother us, Tech Support
The email spam was very tasty!

Hi!
Let's play a mail version of Progressbar95.
Your objective is to collect 100% of [Progress] messages and get a final bonus.
Reply to this message to start
Progressbar95
You have a new mail message!
Thank you for waking me up!
The system cannot be shut down right now. Please try again later
This is a hidden folder. It can only been seen through Terminus
Thank you! Emotional support is very important!
A-A-A-A! I'm having a panic attack!
Help! There is no help! Help!

I have an urgent question! What does IT mean???

Do we need more RAM or more memory in our computers?

Great!
Here is a bonus for my favorite employee!
Boss, Have a great day!
Hi! This is a new and amazing game mode!
The progressbar is moving on its own, but you can turn it around by using a special button
This is the smartest progressbar ever! It is based on the B1 AI chip

May I send you notifications when I'm hungry or sad?

Progressolitaire is a solitaire card game. It is like Klondike, but much simplier, because there is a less number of playing cards.
Your objective is to build up four foundations by suit from Ace to Dog. Each foundation must include five cards in the following sequence: Ace,2,3,Clippy,Dog
The first card must be an Ace!
The first card must be a King!
The correct order is: Ace (1) 2 3 Clippy (Q) King (K)
The correct order is: King (5) Clippy (4) 3 2 Ace(1)
Wrong card color! Choose a black card
Wrong card color! Choose a red card
Drag this card to the foundation deck
You may move cards between fanned piles, but remember that they should be of different colors!
You may use the stock deck. Click it to open
Do you want to exit? You'll lose your current progress!
I'm Bin, and I'm shy. Let's talk later.
Yellow segments are 'corrupted'. They're harmless, but they give you less points. Perfectionists don't collect them
My name is Bin. Please click me

Play and unlock new wallpapers.
Click a thumbnail to select a wallpaper
Try to avoid pink segments. They take away your progress!
Use this menu to open Settings, ProgressDOS or Help
For hackers: use it for secrets and prizes
The game may use Google Play Games for Leaderboards, Achievements and Cloud saving
Are you sure? Google Play Games Leaderboards, Achievements and Cloud saving will be disabled!

Dear player!
Wishing you happiness, peace, fun, and a lot of progress in the coming year!
Merry winter holidays!
Icoeye and Spooky House Studios
This is an experimental driver! The result of its use is completely unpredictable! Do you want to continue?
System File Shield (SFS) has been turned off
You have defeated me, but I have a backup! See you soon! Have a nice day!
